title: Qubool Hai
overview: Qubool Hai is a soap opera on Zee TV produced by 4 Lions Films.It airs on Mondays to Fridays . The show focuses on the Muslim community and aims to dispel stereotypes regarding Islam. The story is based in Bhopal, Madhya Pradesh, India. It stars Karan Singh Grover, Surbhi Jyoti and Vikrant Massey.
